item.title: KSPCA member urges Karnataka CM to announce KSRP battalion for Raichur in budget
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Karnataka State Police Complaints Authority (KSPCA) has written to Chief Minister Siddaramaiah seeking the announcement and budgetary allocation for a new 13th battalion of the Karnataka State Reserve Police (KSRP) in Raichur district in the 2026â€“27 State Budget.
In his letter dated February 19, Mohan Kumar Danappa, member, highlighted the strategic and administrative importance of Raichur district, which is located in the northeastern part of Karnataka, and shares borders with Telangana an...]]>
item.author: Authors
